frontmatter.title: Why you should consider OS X?
frontmatter.description: Back in early 2008, I made a very bold decision to move from Windows to OSX and I must say, I am very happy that I made this transition. Some of the reasons that you might consider to switch to OSX (especially if you've been using Windows).

frontmatter.title: For-loop, to ++i or i++ or not?
frontmatter.description: I just recalled an interesting theory mentioned by my C lecturer back in uni days, use ++i instead of i++ in a for-loop.

frontmatter.title: Spiced Chai
frontmatter.description: So, I have a jar of tea leaves and garam masala. So, let's make some spiced chai, shall we?
